apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this tender emoji depicts a couple, one with a medium-light skin tone and the other with no specified skin tone, enclosed within a vibrant heart. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients give the heart a radiant glow, while the figures are rendered with gentle, rounded edges. This emoji beautifully symbolizes love, romance, and a strong bond between partners, making it an ideal way to express affection and commitment in your messages on Apple devices.
